item.description:
Meet up with The Most Informal Running Club Ever on the Cambridge side of the Charles River for the weekly Saturday Fun Run. We'll split up into groups depending on the turnout for distance and time goals for 3, 5 or 6 mile loops. It's your choice!

What to expect: a seriously fun group of runners who definitely do not take running too seriously. We will meet, chat, RUN, stretch, chat, EAT BREAKFAST and then leave. It's that easy.

Breakfast Details: Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at "The Rock"* for breakfast. If you would like to bring a breakfast item to share (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) please do so by adding your contribution here. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Street parking is easily accessible on Granite Street.

This week at The Most Informal Running Club Ever:

It's Halloween and that means all the spookiness of the year culminates in this one glorious day.

We will meet at the Rock* @ 10:30 to spooky run...but there's a catch...

...Wear your favorite costume, pirate hat, cutoff jean shorts, scary mask, (Obama masks encouraged) or just come as a spooky version of yourself for the run.

informalrunning.com
Breakfast at 11:30 like always.

There will be give aways for:

Best Costume

Most Informal Costume

Anyone who shows up as Dave's Mom

informalrunning.com
Want to bring something for breakfast?

October is great for pumpkins, sweet potatoes, ostrich eggs and milk steak.

Visit our website @ informalrunning.com to see our location, our routes, our shirts, and our leaping horse!

This will be the best run ever!

*"The Rock" is my house, located at the intersection of Granite St. and Rockingham St. It is across the street from Lindstrom Field.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my running shoes.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Spooky Informal Running Club + Breakfast
